name: aamu-blog
description: This repository offers an example site for [hugo-PaperMod](https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod)

scripts.build: node build-with-graphql.js && hugo && git add . && git commit -am '..'
scripts.pub: node build-with-graphql.js && hugo && git add . && git commit -am '..' && echo '*** Pushing' && git push web && git push origin
